name: The Beginning of The END (Ibrahim Rashwan)
name_original: The Beginning of The END (Ibrahim Rashwan)
description:
Complete Challenging Levels to unlock awesome abilities and finish the game (by going back to the Beginning)

Finish the game and break the loop - OR YOU CAN'T DO THAT

Controls:

W/A - Left Arrow/Right Arrow -> Move Left/Right

Space -> Jump/Double Jump

Shift -> Dash
